title: Thank You for the Sweets
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Four, five, six...... Dia-san, don’t you think you bought too much?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>No, I would buy even more if I could take them home.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I guess I’m grateful for your patronage......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I really, really love your family’s matcha sweets. Is there some way I can thank you for making these tasty sweets?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Thank me......? Ah, I know just the thing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Sure, anything you’d like.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Can you help me with my assignments? I told Umi-chan I had already finished it, so I can’t ask her~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Sure, I can help you with that. I’ll help you as much as possible until you understand, Honoka-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Huh? I was hoping you’d just tell me the answers......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>You need to understand the material. I’ll help you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
